verbose_text: Although blocking glutamate transporters did not affect glutamate induced increase of enzymatic ATX activity, inhibition of AMPA, NMDA or mGluR1a receptors (using the specific inhibitors DNQX, APV and LY367385, respectively) significantly inhibited glutamate dependent increase of ATX activity.
evidence: mGluR1a receptors (using the specific inhibitors DNQX, APV and LY367385, respectively) significantly inhibited glutamate-dependent increase of ATX
